document.full_text: at least one man was injured when syrian security forces opened fired to disperse a night-time demonstration on saturday in the eastern city of deir al-zor, scene of growing protests against baathist rule, a witness said.
document.title: syrian forces fire on protesters in east, one hurt
lines_and_colors: at least one man was injured when syrian security forces opened fired to disperse a night-time demonstration on saturday in the eastern city of deir al-zor, scene of growing protests against baathist rule, a witness said.
